title: Add an ant task to download and run luke
description:
Luke (http://www.getopt.org/luke/) is a great tool to help debug understand what is happening in lucene.  

Although luke has a nice webstart app, since solr uses various snapshot builds of lucene, it is sometimes difficult to keep the versions consistent.  

I propose we add an ant task that will download and run luke with the proper jars/classpath.

comments.author: Ryan McKinley
comments.content:
here is a simple patch that lets you run:

 ant luke



and luke will download and run...
